snippet.title: Failspace - Early Access Release Trailer [VR, Vive, Rift, WMR, Index]
snippet.description:
Early Access Release trailer for Failspace, a crisis-solving virtual reality co-op game where you have to nurture your fragile spaceship through the ever-changing dangers of space. Developed by Hipfire Games, available for HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, Windows Mixed Reality and Valve Index. You can find more information, as well as reviews and ratings here: https://vrgamecritic.com/game/failspace

► Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/vrgamecritic?sub_confirmation=1
► Like: https://www.facebook.com/vrgamecritic
► Follow: https://twitter.com/vrgamecritic
► Visit us at: https://vrgamecritic.com
